Class WeaponItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Stick, Wrench
public abstract class WeaponItem extends Item implements Weapon
Class representing items that can be used as a weapon.

  • Constructor Details

    • WeaponItem

      public WeaponItem​(String name, char displayChar, int damage, String verb, int hitRate)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the item
      displayChar - character to use for display when item is on the ground
      damage - amount of damage this weapon does
      verb - verb to use for this weapon, e.g. "hits", "zaps"
      hitRate - the probability/chance to hit the target.

      public String verb()
      Returns the verb used for attacking with this weapon, so that it can be displayed in the UI.
      Specified by:
      verb in interface Weapon
      Returns:
      a third-person present tense verb, e.g. "hits", "zaps"

      public int chanceToHit()
